meta.name: Executive Journal
meta.description: Professional journaling specialization for executives and business leaders
meta.author: Leadership Development Corp

app.name: Executive Journal
app.description: A professional journaling platform designed for executives, entrepreneurs, and business leaders

content.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Executive Journal - elevate your leadership through strategic reflection
content.aboutText: Executive Journal is designed for business leaders who understand the power of reflection in driving strategic thinking and leadership effectiveness.
content.privacyStatement: Designed for executive privacy with local storage and no external data transmission. Perfect for sensitive business reflections and strategic planning.

disclaimers: This application is designed for personal reflection and strategic thinking.
Business decisions should be made with appropriate consultation and due diligence.
The AI features provide analytical insights but should not replace professional business advice.

windowsPackaging.description: Strategic Reflection Platform for Business Leaders
